alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:58AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Over Parts of Lake County... At 555 AM, satellite imagery indicated some patches of dense fog had formed over southern Lake County west of Groveland, father north along the Sumter County line wet of Okahumpka, Leesburg and Lady Lake, and over northeast Lake County from around Paisley to Astor. The fog could reduce visibility to less than one mile in some locations, especially along States Road 50, 44, and 40. Drivers in this area should prepare for rapid changes in visibility. When driving in dense fog, reduce you speed, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra following distance in front of you. The fog should burn off by 8 or 9 AM.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
